ygData.subject: Re: Xegony Daily
ygData.msgSnippet: Apologies to the nonXegony bards. Slyde - I did kinda change guilds. Excalibur is a great guild, but just never able to field enough folks of a similiar level
ygData.messageBody:
Apologies to the nonXegony bards.

Slyde - I did kinda change guilds. Excalibur is a great guild, but just
never able to field enough folks of a similiar level to go do anything. It's
not that we were greedy or anything, just bored with the same zones, etc. So
several of our friends from Excal had left and joined or dual guilded some
time ago to VS. We found ourselves being more and more involved with Venator
Sapentia raids and they becoming the folks we looked for when we logged on
to see what we were going to do. It's difficult to not have the guildchat
when you raid with a guild alot so I retired as an officer of Excalibur and
have guilded my bard to VS. Klaget had already joined a couple weeks before
I did. My wiz and cleric are currently still guilded to Excalibur. It's a
tough call really, because we like the folks in both guilds alot.

Darkfox - We were actually after the Procurator for a key to South and
hopefully a bard mask. We went in last night and got both! I didn't know a
kylong bp dropped, never seen one, although it makes sense with bracers,
arms, and legs dropping. I have the Trak bp so it's doubtful I would be
interested in a kylong bp. I am wearing a kylong bracer and the kylong legs
which everyone tells me look hideous since I got the SS bp. It looks
slightly better as an Erudite: green top and arms, pinkish red skirt, and no
bucket helm!

Brilinnia Ban'Sidhe
Venator Sapentia, Xegony
